## Outline

This repository contains information on species interactions derived from literature 
for inclusion into the Global Biotic Interactions Database (GloBI, http://globalbioticinteractions.org). Interactions are only included if each
organism is specifically referred to in the text.

## Data

Interactions have been recorded from the following sources:

```{r table, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

data <- read.csv("interactions.csv")

count <- data |> 
  dplyr::group_by(referenceCitation) |> 
  dplyr::summarise(count = dplyr::n())

gt::gt(count)


```
